prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jorge Luis Borges, Música patria, 1919-1923, Accession #10155-ad, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This manuscript was purchased by the Library from Jared Loewenstein of the University of Virginia Library, on December 19, 1995.

altformavail.head: Alternative Form
altformavail.p: Also available on microfilm as Manuscript Division reel #M-203.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This is a three-page autograph manuscript, "Música Patria," written in 1919, with additions in 1920 and 1923, by Jorge Luis Borges. There are numerous corrections and revisions by Borges. There are three sketches by Borges included in the manuscript of a farm scene, two musicians and a couple dancing.
